issue.title: [C++] Fix -Werror CHECKIN build with clang-14
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16643](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16643). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With clang-14, the C++ build fails on a handful of new warnings including `-Wreturn-stack-address`. Will submit patch

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16643?focusedCommentId=17541670) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13225
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13225>
